common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/station/dop/scanned-parcels')
request.add_api_parameter("stationCode", "STATION_123456")
request.add_api_parameter("cageNumber", "123")
request.add_api_parameter("trackingNumber", "TEST1231124VN")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/station/dop/scanned-parcels')
request.add_api_param('stationCode', 'STATION_123456')
request.add_api_param('cageNumber', '123')
request.add_api_param('trackingNumber', 'TEST1231124VN')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.message: No parcel info for tracking number {trackingNumber}. Please scan again or manually input the tracking number.
error_codes.description: Cannot find parcel info with provided tracking number

error_codes.message: Station {stationCode} is not a DOP. You can not drop-off here.
Parcel is not at correct status to dropoff, parcel {trackingNumber} is now {status}
Tracking number {trackingNumber} is cancelled. Please remove out of list
Seller is a MDOP, your parcel cannot be dropped-off to any station. DOP Merchant={sellerName}, and TN={trackingNumber}
error_codes.description: The seller of the parcel is MDOP
Client submit duplicate request at the same time
Mostly the stacktrace of unexpected error
